name: Everyday Life (Tomi, FoxDeath)
description:
Description:

You go through an infuriating day, getting into trouble wherever you go, and let’s not even talk about that voice inside your head trying to get you down. 

Will you give up? Or will you fight through the day, let loose at the end and live to see another.

Controls:

First Minigame:

Mouse - Draw

Second and Third Minigame:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Credits:

Radu-Constantin Matusa - Programming

Tomi Faludi - Programming

Andrei Mataoanu - Programing / 3D Modeling

Adam Badura - 3D Modeling
